publisher.value: Health Level Seven International (Orders and Observations)

description.value: This is a specialized resource that defines the characteristics and capabilities of a device.

short.value: An instance of a medical-related component of a medical device

definition.value: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

comment.value: For the initial scope, this DeviceDefinition resource is only applicable to describe a single node in the containment tree that is produced by the context scanner in any medical device that implements or derives from the ISO/IEEE 11073 standard and that does not represent a metric. Examples for such a node are MDS, VMD, or Channel.

short.value: Additional information to describe the device

definition.value: Additional information to describe the device.

short.value: Instance identifier

definition.value: Unique instance identifiers assigned to a device by the software, manufacturers, other organizations or owners. For example: handle ID. The identifier is typically valued if the udiDeviceIdentifier, partNumber or modelNumber is not valued and represents a different type of identifier. However, it is permissible to still include those identifiers in DeviceDefinition.identifier with the appropriate identifier.type.

short.value: Unique Device Identifier (UDI) Barcode string

definition.value: Unique device identifier (UDI) assigned to device label or package. Note that the Device may include multiple udiCarriers as it either may include just the udiCarrier for the jurisdiction it is sold, or for multiple jurisdictions it could have been sold.

short.value: The identifier that is to be associated with every Device that references this DeviceDefintiion for the issuer and jurisdiction provided in the DeviceDefinition.udiDeviceIdentifier

definition.value: The identifier that is to be associated with every Device that references this DeviceDefintiion for the issuer and jurisdiction provided in the DeviceDefinition.udiDeviceIdentifier.

short.value: The organization that assigns the identifier algorithm

definition.value: The organization that assigns the identifier algorithm.

short.value: The jurisdiction to which the deviceIdentifier applies

definition.value: The jurisdiction to which the deviceIdentifier applies.

short.value: Indicates whether and when the device is available on the market

definition.value: Indicates where and when the device is available on the market.

short.value: Begin and end dates for the commercial distribution of the device

definition.value: Begin and end dates for the commercial distribution of the device.

short.value: National state or territory where the device is commercialized

definition.value: National state or territory to which the marketDistribution recers, typically where the device is commercialized.

short.value: Regulatory identifier(s) associated with this device

definition.value: Identifier associated with the regulatory documentation (certificates, technical documentation, post-market surveillance documentation and reports) of a set of device models sharing the same intended purpose, risk class and essential design and manufacturing characteristics. One example is the Basic UDI-DI in Europe.

comment.value: This should not be used for regulatory authorization numbers which are to be captured elsewhere.

short.value: basic | master | license

definition.value: The type of identifier itself.

short.value: The identifier itself

definition.value: The identifier itself.

short.value: The organization that issued this identifier

definition.value: The organization that issued this identifier.

short.value: The jurisdiction to which the deviceIdentifier applies

definition.value: The jurisdiction to which the deviceIdentifier applies.

short.value: The part number or catalog number of the device

definition.value: The part number or catalog number of the device.

short.value: Name of device manufacturer

definition.value: A name of the manufacturer or legal representative e.g. labeler. Whether this is the actual manufacturer or the labeler or responsible depends on implementation and jurisdiction.

short.value: The name or names of the device as given by the manufacturer

definition.value: The name or names of the device as given by the manufacturer.

short.value: A name that is used to refer to the device

definition.value: A human-friendly name that is used to refer to the device - depending on the type, it can be the brand name, the common name or alias, or other.

short.value: registered-name | user-friendly-name | patient-reported-name

definition.value: The type of deviceName. RegisteredName | UserFriendlyName | PatientReportedName.

description.value: The type of name the device is referred by.

short.value: The catalog or model number for the device for example as defined by the manufacturer

definition.value: The model number for the device for example as defined by the manufacturer or labeler, or other agency.

short.value: What kind of device or device system this is

definition.value: What kind of device or device system this is.

comment.value: In this element various classifications can be used, such as GMDN, EMDN, SNOMED CT, risk classes, national product codes.

short.value: A classification or risk class of the device model

definition.value: A classification or risk class of the device model.

description.value: Type of device e.g. according to official classification.

short.value: Further information qualifying this classification of the device model

definition.value: Further information qualifying this classification of the device model.

short.value: The capabilities supported on a device, the standards to which the device conforms for a particular purpose, and used for the communication

definition.value: The capabilities supported on a device, the standards to which the device conforms for a particular purpose, and used for the communication.

short.value: A device, part of the current one

definition.value: A device that is part (for example a component) of the present device.

short.value: Reference to the part

definition.value: Reference to the device that is part of the current device.

short.value: Number of occurrences of the part

definition.value: Number of instances of the component device in the current device.

short.value: Information about the packaging of the device, i.e. how the device is packaged

definition.value: Information about the packaging of the device, i.e. how the device is packaged.

short.value: Business identifier of the packaged medication

definition.value: The business identifier of the packaged medication.

short.value: A code that defines the specific type of packaging

definition.value: A code that defines the specific type of packaging.

short.value: The number of items contained in the package (devices or sub-packages)

definition.value: The number of items contained in the package (devices or sub-packages).

short.value: An organization that distributes the packaged device

definition.value: An organization that distributes the packaged device.

short.value: Distributor's human-readable name

definition.value: Distributor's human-readable name.

short.value: Distributor as an Organization resource

definition.value: Distributor as an Organization resource.

short.value: Unique Device Identifier (UDI) Barcode string on the packaging

definition.value: Unique Device Identifier (UDI) Barcode string on the packaging.

short.value: Allows packages within packages

definition.value: Allows packages within packages.

short.value: The version of the device or software

definition.value: The version of the device or software.

short.value: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal

definition.value: The type of the device version, e.g. manufacturer, approved, internal.

short.value: The hardware or software module of the device to which the version applies

definition.value: The hardware or software module of the device to which the version applies.

comment.value: Note that the module of the device would not need to be tracked as a separate device, e.g., using different UDI, thus would typically involve one or more software modules. For example, a device may involve two software modules each on a different version.

short.value: The version text

definition.value: The version text.

short.value: Safety characteristics of the device

definition.value: Safety characteristics of the device.

short.value: Shelf Life and storage information

definition.value: Shelf Life and storage information.

short.value: Language code for the human-readable text strings produced by the device (all supported)

definition.value: Language code for the human-readable text strings produced by the device (all supported).

short.value: The potential, valid configuration settings of a device, e.g., regulation status, time properties

definition.value: The potential, valid configuration settings of a device, e.g., regulation status, time properties.

short.value: Code that specifies the property

definition.value: Code that specifies the property.

short.value: Property value - as a code or quantity

definition.value: Property value - the data type depends on the property type.

comment.value: The usage of CodeableConcept is for concepts that are normally coded but for which a code is not available - for example a device implant size that is not standardized. The property string is for text characteristics, e.g. long descriptions, warnings, etc.

short.value: Organization responsible for device

definition.value: An organization that is responsible for the provision and ongoing maintenance of the device.

short.value: Details for human/organization for support

definition.value: Contact details for an organization or a particular human that is responsible for the device.

short.value: An associated device, attached to, used with, communicating with or linking a previous or new device model to the focal device

definition.value: An associated device, attached to, used with, communicating with or linking a previous or new device model to the focal device.

short.value: The type indicates the relationship of the related device to the device instance

definition.value: The type indicates the relationship of the related device to the device instance.

description.value: The type of relation between this and the linked device.

short.value: A reference to the linked device

definition.value: A reference to the linked device.

short.value: Device notes and comments

definition.value: Descriptive information, usage information or implantation information that is not captured in an existing element.

short.value: The parent device it can be part of

definition.value: The parent device it can be part of.

short.value: A substance used to create the material(s) of which the device is made

definition.value: A substance used to create the material(s) of which the device is made.

short.value: A relevant substance that the device contains, may contain, or is made of

definition.value: A substance that the device contains, may contain, or is made of - for example latex - to be used to determine patient compatibility. This is not intended to represent the composition of the device, only the clinically relevant materials.

short.value: Indicates an alternative material of the device

definition.value: Indicates an alternative material of the device.

short.value: Whether the substance is a known or suspected allergen

definition.value: Whether the substance is a known or suspected allergen.

short.value: lot-number | manufactured-date | serial-number | expiration-date | biological-source | software-version

definition.value: Indicates the production identifier(s) that are expected to appear in the UDI carrier on the device label.

description.value: The production identifier(s) that are expected to appear in the UDI carrier.

short.value: Information aimed at providing directions for the usage of this model of device

definition.value: Information aimed at providing directions for the usage of this model of device.

short.value: The circumstances that form the setting for using the device

definition.value: The circumstances that form the setting for using the device.

short.value: Detailed written and visual directions for the user on how to use the device

definition.value: Detailed written and visual directions for the user on how to use the device.

short.value: A source of information or reference for this guideline

definition.value: A source of information or reference for this guideline.

short.value: A clinical condition for which the device was designed to be used

definition.value: A clinical condition for which the device was designed to be used.

short.value: A specific situation when a device should not be used because it may cause harm

definition.value: A specific situation when a device should not be used because it may cause harm.

short.value: Specific hazard alert information that a user needs to know before using the device

definition.value: Specific hazard alert information that a user needs to know before using the device.

short.value: A description of the general purpose or medical use of the device or its function

definition.value: A description of the general purpose or medical use of the device or its function.

short.value: Tracking of latest field safety corrective action

definition.value: Tracking of latest field safety corrective action.

short.value: Whether the corrective action was a recall

definition.value: Whether the last corrective action known for this device was a recall.

comment.value: When a field safety action has been initiated but not yet resulted in a recall, this element will be set to 'false'.

short.value: model | lot-numbers | serial-numbers

definition.value: The scope of the corrective action - whether the action targeted all units of a given device model, or only a specific set of batches identified by lot numbers, or individually identified devices identified by the serial name.

description.value: The type or scope of the corrective action.

short.value: Start and end dates of the corrective action

definition.value: Start and end dates of the corrective action.

short.value: Billing code or reference associated with the device

definition.value: Billing code or reference associated with the device.

short.value: The code or reference for the charge item

definition.value: The code or reference for the charge item.

short.value: Coefficient applicable to the billing code

definition.value: Coefficient applicable to the billing code.

short.value: A specific time period in which this charge item applies

definition.value: A specific time period in which this charge item applies.

short.value: The context to which this charge item applies

definition.value: The context to which this charge item applies.
